name: Tower Of Wishes
description:
Tower Of Wishes is a family friendly, fun Match3. The game also includes mini games for that bit of extra fun!

Tower Of Wishes has existed since untold millennia. It is said that the ones who climb to the top of the tower can have a wish granted.

Five years ago, you were found wandering the streets of the town. In a daze, you could not remember your name, nor where you came from. Although now you own a house and a small food stall, you have always wondered where you came from.

Perhaps you might just try climbing the tower...
Enjoy your match3 the way you want: Play timed, move limited, or endless. Choose difficulty and graphics quality. Play the mini games, or skip them.

Features
✪ Pick up and play
✪ Hidden Object, Find the differences mini games
✪ 100 levels of match 3 fun!
✪ Chain Solitaire mini game
✪ Gameplay options can be changed anytime
✪ New types of runes and tiles
